statements: SELECT * FROM fund_performance_data ORDER BY fund_id DESC;
SELECT fund_name, fund_assets FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_rating > 4;
SELECT fund_type, fund_return FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_assets > 1000000;
SELECT fund_id, fund_rating, fund_assets FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_return < 0;
SELECT * FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_type = 'Equity' AND fund_rating < 3 ORDER BY fund_assets DESC;
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_return FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_type = 'Equity' ORDER BY fund_return DESC;
SELECT * FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_rating >= 4 AND fund_assets > 1000000 ORDER BY fund_rating DESC, fund_assets ASC;
SELECT fund_name, fund_type, fund_assets FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_assets BETWEEN 500000 AND 1000000 ORDER BY fund_name ASC;
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_rating FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_type = 'Income' OR fund_type = 'Growth' ORDER BY fund_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_funds, AVG(fund_return) AS avg_return FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_rating IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM fund_performance_data;
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_return FROM fund_performance_data;
SELECT fund_name, fund_manager FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_return > 0;
SELECT * FROM fund_performance_data ORDER BY fund_return DESC;
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_return FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_type = 'Equity';
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_manager, fund_return FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_type='Equity' ORDER BY fund_return DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_return > 5.0
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_manager, fund_return FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_return > 5.0 ORDER BY fund_return DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_type, fund_return FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_type='Fixed Income' OR fund_type='Equity'
SELECT fund_name, fund_return FROM fund_performance_data WHERE fund_type='Equity' OR fund_manager='John Doe' ORDER BY fund_return DESC
SELECT * FROM Fund_Performance WHERE fund_return > 8.00;
SELECT fund_name, fund_type, fund_yearly_growth FROM Fund_Performance WHERE fund_type = 'Equity';
SELECT fund_name, fund_return FROM Fund_Performance WHERE fund_return BETWEEN 6.00 AND 10.00 ORDER BY fund_return DESC;
SELECT option_name, option_type, option_rating FROM Investment_Options WHERE option_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY option_rating;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio_Recommendations WHERE allocation_percentage < 50.00 ORDER BY allocation_percentage ASC;
SELECT * FROM Fund_Performance WHERE fund_return > 10.0 ORDER BY fund_yearly_growth DESC
SELECT fund_name, fund_type, fund_return FROM Fund_Performance WHERE fund_type = 'Equity'
SELECT fund_name, fund_type, fund_return FROM Fund_Performance WHERE fund_yearly_growth BETWEEN 3.0 AND 5.0 ORDER BY fund_return DESC

SELECT recommendation_id, portfolio_name, option_name, allocation_percentage FROM Portfolio_Recommendations JOIN Investment_Options ON Portfolio_Recommendations.recommended_option_id = Investment_Options.option_id
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_type, fund_return, fund_yearly_growth FROM Fund_Performance WHERE fund_type = 'Fixed Income' ORDER BY fund_return ASC
SELECT * FROM Fund_Performance ORDER BY fund_name DESC;
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_return FROM Fund_Performance WHERE fund_rating > 3;
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_rating FROM Fund_Performance WHERE fund_type = 'Equity' AND fund_return > 5.0;
SELECT option_id, option_name, option_type FROM Investment_Options WHERE fund_id = 101 ORDER BY option_name;

SELECT p.portfolio_id, p.portfolio_name, pc.option_id, pc.allocation FROM Portfolio p INNER JOIN Portfolio_Composition pc ON p.portfolio_id = pc.portfolio_id WHERE pc.option_id = 201 ORDER BY pc.allocation DESC;
SELECT * FROM Fund_Performance WHERE fund_rating > 4;
SELECT fund_name, fund_type, fund_return FROM Fund_Performance ORDER BY fund_return DESC;

SELECT portfolio_name, option_name, allocation FROM Portfolio_Composition JOIN Portfolio ON Portfolio_Composition.portfolio_id = Portfolio.portfolio_id JOIN Investment_Options ON Portfolio_Composition.option_id = Investment_Options.option_id;
SELECT option_name, fund_name, fund_return FROM Investment_Options JOIN Fund_Performance ON Investment_Options.fund_id = Fund_Performance.fund_id WHERE Fund_Performance.fund_return > 5;

SELECT option_name, fund_name, portfolio_name FROM Investment_Options JOIN Fund_Performance ON Investment_Options.fund_id = Fund_Performance.fund_id JOIN Portfolio_Composition ON Investment_Options.option_id = Portfolio_Composition.option_id JOIN Portfolio ON Portfolio_Composition.portfolio_id = Portfolio.portfolio_id ORDER BY portfolio_name ASC;
SELECT fund_name, performance FROM FundPerformance;
SELECT option_name, risk_level, expected_return FROM InvestmentOptions ORDER BY expected_return DESC;
SELECT recommended_name, portfolio_id FROM PortfolioRecommendations WHERE portfolio_id = 3;
SELECT manager_name, experience_years FROM FundManagers ORDER BY experience_years ASC;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentHistory WHERE amount_invested > 50000;
SELECT fund_id, fund_name, fund_type, performance FROM FundPerformance WHERE performance > 0.07 ORDER BY performance DESC;
SELECT option_name, risk_level, expected_return FROM InvestmentOptions WHERE risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY expected_return DESC;
SELECT portfolio_id, recommended_name, composition_json FROM PortfolioRecommendations WHERE LENGTH(composition_json) > 100;
SELECT manager_name, experience_years FROM FundManagers ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT option_name, fund_name, investment_date, amount_invested FROM InvestmentHistory WHERE amount_invested > 50000 ORDER BY investment_date ASC;
